name: gitlab
description: A web-based DevOps lifecycle tool that provides a Git repository manager providing wiki, issue-tracking, and CI/CD pipeline features.

tools.name: GITLAB_ARCHIVE_PROJECT
tools.description: Tool to archive a project. Use when you need to mark a project read-only after finishing active development. Call after confirming no further changes are required.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project to archive.

tools.name: GITLAB_CREATE_GROUP
tools.description: Tool to create a new group in GitLab. Use when you need to establish a new group for projects or collaboration.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: Image file for avatar of the group.

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: The parent group ID for creating nested group.

lfs_enabled.title: Lfs Enabled
lfs_enabled.description: Enable/disable Large File Storage (LFS) for the projects in this group.

default_branch.title: Default Branch
default_branch.description: The default branch name for group’s projects.

membership_lock.title: Membership Lock
membership_lock.description: Users cannot be added to projects in this group. Premium and Ultimate only.

organization_id.title: Organization Id
organization_id.description: The organization ID for the group.

duo_availability.title: Duo Availability
duo_availability.description: Duo availability setting. Note: In the UI, never_on is displayed as "Always Off".

mentions_disabled.title: Mentions Disabled
mentions_disabled.description: Disable the capability of a group from getting mentioned.

wiki_access_level.title: Wiki Access Level
wiki_access_level.description: The wiki access level. Premium and Ultimate only.

auto_devops_enabled.title: Auto Devops Enabled
auto_devops_enabled.description: Default to Auto DevOps pipeline for all projects within this group.

share_with_group_lock.title: Share With Group Lock
share_with_group_lock.description: Prevent sharing a project with another group within this group.

project_creation_level.title: Project Creation Level
project_creation_level.description: Determine if developers can create projects in the group.

request_access_enabled.title: Request Access Enabled
request_access_enabled.description: Allow users to request member access.

two_factor_grace_period.title: Two Factor Grace Period
two_factor_grace_period.description: Time before Two-factor authentication is enforced (in hours).

experiment_features_enabled.title: Experiment Features Enabled
experiment_features_enabled.description: Enable experiment features for this group.

shared_runners_minutes_limit.title: Shared Runners Minutes Limit
shared_runners_minutes_limit.description: Can be set by administrators only. Maximum number of monthly compute minutes for this group. Can be nil (default; inherit system default), 0 (unlimited), or > 0. GitLab Self-Managed, Premium and Ultimate only.

require_two_factor_authentication.title: Require Two Factor Authentication
require_two_factor_authentication.description: Require all users in this group to set up two-factor authentication.

default_branch_protection_defaults.title: Default Branch Protection Defaults
default_branch_protection_defaults.description: Options for default_branch_protection_defaults. E.g. {"allowed_to_push": [{"access_level":40}], "allow_force_push": False, "allowed_to_merge": [{"access_level":40}], "developer_can_initial_push": False}

extra_shared_runners_minutes_limit.title: Extra Shared Runners Minutes Limit
extra_shared_runners_minutes_limit.description: Can be set by administrators only. Additional compute minutes for this group. GitLab Self-Managed, Premium and Ultimate only.

tools.name: GITLAB_CREATE_PROJECT
tools.description: Tool to create a new project in GitLab. Implements POST /projects endpoint.

path.title: Path
path.description: The path or URL-friendly name for the project.

namespace_id.title: Namespace Id
namespace_id.description: The namespace (group or user ID) under which to create the project.

tools.name: GITLAB_CREATE_PROJECT_ISSUE
tools.description: Tool to create a new issue in a GitLab project. Use when you need to report a bug, request a feature, or track a task within a specific project.

id.title: Id
id.description: The global ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

iid.title: Iid
iid.description: The internal ID of the project’s issue (requires administrator or project owner rights).

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Comma-separated label names to assign to the new issue. If a label does not already exist, this creates a new project label and assigns it to the issue.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: The weight of the issue. Valid values are greater than or equal to 0. Premium and Ultimate only.

epic_id.title: Epic Id
epic_id.description: ID of the epic to add the issue to. Valid values are greater than or equal to 0. Premium and Ultimate only.

due_date.title: Due Date
due_date.description: The due date. Date time string in the format `YYYY-MM-DD`, for example `2016-03-11`.

epic_iid.title: Epic Iid
epic_iid.description: IID of the epic to add the issue to. Valid values are greater than or equal to 0. (deprecated, scheduled for removal in API version 5). Premium and Ultimate only.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: When the issue was created. Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, for example `2016-03-11T03:45:40Z`. Requires administrator or project/group owner rights.

issue_type.title: Issue Type
issue_type.description: The type of issue. One of `issue`, `incident`, `test_case` or `task`. Default is `issue`.

assignee_id.title: Assignee Id
assignee_id.description: The ID of the user to assign the issue to. Only appears on GitLab Free.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of an issue. Limited to 1,048,576 characters.

assignee_ids.title: Assignee Ids
assignee_ids.description: The IDs of the users to assign the issue to. Premium and Ultimate only.

confidential.title: Confidential
confidential.description: Set an issue to be confidential. Default is false.

milestone_id.title: Milestone Id
milestone_id.description: The global ID of a milestone to assign issue. To find the `milestone_id` associated with a milestone, view an issue with the milestone assigned and use the API to retrieve the issue’s details.

discussion_to_resolve.title: Discussion To Resolve
discussion_to_resolve.description: The ID of a discussion to resolve. This fills out the issue with a default description and mark the discussion as resolved. Use in combination with `merge_request_to_resolve_discussions_of`.

merge_request_to_resolve_discussions_of.title: Merge Request To Resolve Discussions Of
merge_request_to_resolve_discussions_of.description: The IID of a merge request in which to resolve all issues. This fills out the issue with a default description and mark all discussions as resolved. When passing a description or title, these values take precedence over the default values.

tools.name: GITLAB_CREATE_REPOSITORY_BRANCH
tools.description: Tool to create a new branch in a project. Use when you need to create a new branch from an existing branch or a specific commit in a GitLab project.

ref.title: Ref
ref.description: The branch name or commit SHA to create the new branch from.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

branch_name.title: Branch Name
branch_name.description: The name of the new branch.

tools.name: GITLAB_DELETE_PROJECT
tools.description: Tool to delete a GitLab project by its ID. Use when you need to remove a project, either by marking it for later deletion or deleting it immediately.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project to be deleted.

full_path.title: Full Path
full_path.description: The full path of the project (e.g., namespace/project_name). Used with `permanently_remove=true` for immediate deletion. Available in GitLab Free from 18.0 (previously Premium/Ultimate only since 15.11).

permanently_remove.title: Permanently Remove
permanently_remove.description: If true, the project is deleted immediately. Otherwise, it is marked for deletion and removed after a retention period. Available in GitLab Free from 18.0 (previously Premium/Ultimate only since 15.11).

tools.name: GITLAB_DOWNLOAD_PROJECT_AVATAR
tools.description: Tool to download a project’s avatar image. Use when you need the raw avatar bytes after confirming the project exists.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project whose avatar to download.

tools.name: GITLAB_ERASE_JOB
tools.description: Tool to erase the content of a specified job within a project. Use when you need to remove job artifacts and logs.

job_id.title: Job Id
job_id.description: The ID of the job to be erased.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_COMMIT_REFS
tools.description: Tool to get all references (branches or tags) a commit is pushed to. Use when you need to find out which branches or tags a specific commit belongs to in a GitLab project.

ref_type.title: Ref Type
ref_type.description: The scope of commits to list. Possible values are `branch`, `tag`, or `all`.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_COMMIT_SEQUENCE
tools.description: Tool to get the sequence number of a commit in a project by following parent links from the given commit. Use when you need to determine the order of a commit in the project's history.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

first_parent.title: First Parent
first_parent.description: Follow only the first parent commit upon seeing a merge commit.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_GROUP
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about a specific group by its ID. Use when you need to get details of a GitLab group.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group.

with_projects.title: With Projects
with_projects.description: Include details from projects that belong to the specified group (defaults to true). Deprecated, scheduled for removal in API v5.

with_custom_attributes.title: With Custom Attributes
with_custom_attributes.description: Include custom attributes in response (administrators only).

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_GROUP_MEMBER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific group member. Use when you need to fetch membership information for a user in a group after you know both group ID and user ID.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user ID of the group member to retrieve.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_GROUPS
tools.description: Get Groups

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Return groups sorted in 'asc' or 'desc' order.

owned.title: Owned
owned.description: Limit to groups owned by the current user.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search for groups by name or path.

order_by.title: Order By
order_by.description: Return groups ordered by this field.

all_available.title: All Available
all_available.description: Include all groups the user has access to (admin only).

skip_groups[].title: Skip Groups[]
skip_groups[].description: List of group IDs to exclude.

min_access_level.title: Min Access Level
min_access_level.description: Limit to groups with minimum access level.

with_custom_attributes.title: With Custom Attributes
with_custom_attributes.description: Include custom attributes in response (admins only).

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_JOB_DETAILS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a single job by its ID within a specified project. Use this when you need to fetch specific information about a particular CI/CD job.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_MERGE_REQUEST_NOTES
tools.description: Tool to fetch comments on a merge request. Use when you need to retrieve all notes for a specific merge request.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

merge_request_iid.title: Merge Request Iid
merge_request_iid.description: Internal ID of the merge request.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_PROJECT
tools.description: Tool to get a single project by ID or URL-encoded path.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_PROJECT_LANGUAGES
tools.description: Tool to list programming languages used in a project with percentages. Use when you need the project language breakdown.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_PROJECT_MEMBER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific project member. Use after confirming project and user IDs to fetch membership information for a project member.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user ID of the project member to retrieve.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_PROJECT_MEMBER_ALL
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific project member (including inherited and invited members). Use when you need the effective membership info (including invitations and inheritance).

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user ID of the project member.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_PROJECT_MERGE_REQUEST_COMMITS
tools.description: Tool to get commits of a merge request. Use when you need to retrieve all commits associated with a specific merge request.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

merge_request_iid.title: Merge Request Iid
merge_request_iid.description: Internal ID of the merge request.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_PROJECT_MERGE_REQUESTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of merge requests for a specific project. Use when you need to get all merge requests associated with a project, with options to filter by state, labels, milestones, and other attributes.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

wip.title: Wip
wip.description: Filter merge requests against their wip status. Use yes to return only draft merge requests, no to return non-draft merge requests.

page.title: Page
page.description: The page of results to return. Defaults to 1.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Returns requests sorted in asc or desc order. Default is desc.

view.title: View
view.description: If simple, returns the iid, URL, title, description, and basic state of merge request.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Returns merge requests for the given scope: created_by_me, assigned_to_me or all. Defaults to created_by_me.

state.title: State
state.description: Returns all merge requests or just those that are opened, closed, locked, or merged.

iids[].title: Iids[]
iids[].description: Returns the request having the given iid.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Returns merge requests matching a comma-separated list of labels. None lists all merge requests with no labels. Any lists all merge requests with at least one label. Predefined names are case-insensitive.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search merge requests against their title and description.

approved.title: Approved
approved.description: Filters merge requests by their approved status. yes returns only approved merge requests. no returns only non-approved merge requests. Requires the mr_approved_filter feature flag, disabled by default.

order_by.title: Order By
order_by.description: Returns requests ordered by created_at, title, merged_at, or updated_at fields. Default is created_at.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: The number of results per page. Defaults to 20.

author_id.title: Author Id
author_id.description: Returns merge requests created by the given user id. Mutually exclusive with author_username. Combine with scope=all or scope=assigned_to_me.

milestone.title: Milestone
milestone.description: Returns merge requests for a specific milestone. None returns merge requests with no milestone. Any returns merge requests that have an assigned milestone.

not_filter.title: Not Filter
not_filter.description: Returns merge requests that do not match the parameters supplied. Accepts: labels, milestone, author_id, author_username, assignee_id, assignee_username, reviewer_id, reviewer_username, my_reaction_emoji.

assignee_id.title: Assignee Id
assignee_id.description: Returns merge requests assigned to the given user id. None returns unassigned merge requests. Any returns merge requests with an assignee.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Returns merge requests deployed to the given environment.

reviewer_id.title: Reviewer Id
reviewer_id.description: Returns merge requests which have the user as a reviewer with the given user id. None returns merge requests with no reviewers. Any returns merge requests with any reviewer. Mutually exclusive with reviewer_username.

approver_ids.title: Approver Ids
approver_ids.description: Returns merge requests which have specified all the users with the given id as individual approvers. None returns merge requests without approvers. Any returns merge requests with an approver. Premium and Ultimate only.

created_after.title: Created After
created_after.description: Returns merge requests created on or after the given time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z).

merge_user_id.title: Merge User Id
merge_user_id.description: Returns the merge requests merged by the user with the given user id. Mutually exclusive with merge_user_username. Introduced in GitLab 17.0.

source_branch.title: Source Branch
source_branch.description: Returns merge requests with the given source branch.

target_branch.title: Target Branch
target_branch.description: Returns merge requests with the given target branch.

updated_after.title: Updated After
updated_after.description: Returns merge requests updated on or after the given time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z).

created_before.title: Created Before
created_before.description: Returns merge requests created on or before the given time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z).

deployed_after.title: Deployed After
deployed_after.description: Returns merge requests deployed after the given date/time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z).

updated_before.title: Updated Before
updated_before.description: Returns merge requests updated on or before the given time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z).

approved_by_ids.title: Approved By Ids
approved_by_ids.description: Returns merge requests approved by all the users with the given id, up to 5 users. None returns merge requests with no approvals. Any returns merge requests with an approval. Premium and Ultimate only.

author_username.title: Author Username
author_username.description: Returns merge requests created by the given username. Mutually exclusive with author_id.

deployed_before.title: Deployed Before
deployed_before.description: Returns merge requests deployed before the given date/time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z).

my_reaction_emoji.title: My Reaction Emoji
my_reaction_emoji.description: Returns merge requests reacted by the authenticated user by the given emoji. None returns issues not given a reaction. Any returns issues given at least one reaction.

reviewer_username.title: Reviewer Username
reviewer_username.description: Returns merge requests which have the user as a reviewer with the given username. None returns merge requests with no reviewers. Any returns merge requests with any reviewer. Mutually exclusive with reviewer_id.

merge_user_username.title: Merge User Username
merge_user_username.description: Returns the merge requests merged by the user with the given username. Mutually exclusive with merge_user_id. Introduced in GitLab 17.0.

with_labels_details.title: With Labels Details
with_labels_details.description: If true, response returns more details for each label in labels field: :name, :color, :description, :description_html, :text_color. Default is false.

with_merge_status_recheck.title: With Merge Status Recheck
with_merge_status_recheck.description: If true, this projection requests (but does not guarantee) an asynchronous recalculation of the merge_status field. Enable the restrict_merge_status_recheck feature flag to ignore this attribute when requested by users without at least the Developer role.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_PROJECTS
tools.description: Tool to list all projects accessible to the authenticated user. Supports filtering.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Return projects sorted in 'asc' or 'desc' order. Default is 'desc'.

owned.title: Owned
owned.description: Limit by projects explicitly owned by the current user.

search.title: Search
search.description: Return list of projects matching search criteria (case-insensitive substring).

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: Return only limited fields for each project.

starred.title: Starred
starred.description: Limit by projects starred by the current user.

id_after.title: Id After
id_after.description: Limit results to projects with IDs greater than the specified ID.

order_by.title: Order By
order_by.description: Return projects ordered by this field. Default is 'created_at'.

id_before.title: Id Before
id_before.description: Limit results to projects with IDs less than the specified ID.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Limit by projects that the current user is a member of.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Include project statistics. Available to Reporter role and above.

min_access_level.title: Min Access Level
min_access_level.description: Limit by current user minimal role (access_level).

with_custom_attributes.title: With Custom Attributes
with_custom_attributes.description: Include custom attributes in response (admin only).

with_programming_language.title: With Programming Language
with_programming_language.description: Limit by projects which use the given programming language.

with_merge_requests_enabled.title: With Merge Requests Enabled
with_merge_requests_enabled.description: Limit by enabled merge requests feature.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_PROJECTS_ID_MERGE_REQUESTS_IID_DIFFS
tools.description: Tool to list all diff versions of a merge request. Use when you need to inspect changes across different diff versions after creating or updating a merge request.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

merge_request_iid.title: Merge Request Iid
merge_request_iid.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_REPOSITORY_BRANCH
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about a specific branch in a project. Use when you need to get details for a single branch.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

branch_name.title: Branch Name
branch_name.description: The URL-encoded name of the branch.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_REPOSITORY_BRANCHES
tools.description: Retrieves a list of repository branches for a project. Use this when you need to get all branches or search for specific branches within a GitLab project.

regex.title: Regex
regex.description: Return list of branches with names matching a re2 regular expression.

search.title: Search
search.description: Return list of branches containing the search string. Use `^term` to find branches that begin with `term`, and `term$` to find branches that end with `term`.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_SINGLE_COMMIT
tools.description: Tool to get a specific commit identified by the commit hash or name of a branch or tag. Use this when you need to retrieve detailed information about a single commit in a GitLab project repository.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

sha.title: Sha
sha.description: The commit hash or name of a repository branch or tag.

stats.title: Stats
stats.description: Include commit stats. Default is true.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_SINGLE_PIPELINE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a single pipeline by its ID within a specified project. Use when you need to get information about a specific CI/CD pipeline.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_USER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about a specific user by their ID. Use when you need to fetch details for a single GitLab user.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the user.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_USER_PREFERENCES
tools.description: Tool to get the current user's preferences. Use when you need to retrieve the user's diff display and CI identity JWT settings after authentication.

inputSchema.title: GetUserPreferencesRequest
inputSchema.description: No parameters are required for this request.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_USERS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of users from GitLab. Use this when you need to find user information, search for specific users, or filter users based on various criteria like activity status or creation date.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Return users sorted in 'asc' or 'desc' order. Default is 'desc'. (Admin only)

active.title: Active
active.description: Filters only active users. Default is false.

admins.title: Admins
admins.description: Return only administrators. Default is false. (Admin only)

humans.title: Humans
humans.description: Filters only regular users that are not bot or internal users. Default is false.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search for users by name, username, or public email.

blocked.title: Blocked
blocked.description: Filters only blocked users. Default is false.

auditors.title: Auditors
auditors.description: Return only auditor users. Default is false. If not included, it returns all users. (Admin only, Premium and Ultimate only)

external.title: External
external.description: Filters only external users. Default is false.

order_by.title: Order By
order_by.description: Return users ordered by 'id', 'name', 'username', 'created_at', or 'updated_at' fields. Default is 'id'. (Admin only)

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items per page for pagination.

username.title: Username
username.description: Get a single user with a specific username.

skip_ldap.title: Skip Ldap
skip_ldap.description: Skip LDAP users. (Admin only, Premium and Ultimate only)

extern_uid.title: Extern Uid
extern_uid.description: Get a single user with a specific external authentication provider UID. (Admin only)

two_factor.title: Two Factor
two_factor.description: Filter users by Two-factor authentication. Filter values are 'enabled' or 'disabled'. (Admin only)

created_after.title: Created After
created_after.description: Return users created after specified time (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

created_before.title: Created Before
created_before.description: Return users created before specified time (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

exclude_active.title: Exclude Active
exclude_active.description: Filters only non active users. Default is false.

exclude_humans.title: Exclude Humans
exclude_humans.description: Filters only bot or internal users. Default is false.

exclude_external.title: Exclude External
exclude_external.description: Filters only non external users. Default is false.

exclude_internal.title: Exclude Internal
exclude_internal.description: Filters only non internal users. Default is false.

without_projects.title: Without Projects
without_projects.description: Filter users without projects. Default is false. (Admin only)

without_project_bots.title: Without Project Bots
without_project_bots.description: Filters user without project bots. Default is false.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_USERS_ID_STATUS
tools.description: Tool to get a user's status by ID. Use when you need to retrieve a GitLab user's current status message, emoji, and availability after identifying their user ID.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The numeric ID of the GitLab user whose status you want to retrieve.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_USER_STATUS
tools.description: Tool to get the current user's status. Use when displaying or verifying the authenticated user's GitLab status after login.

inputSchema.title: GetUserStatusRequest
inputSchema.description: No parameters are required for this request.

tools.name: GITLAB_GET_USER_SUPPORT_PIN
tools.description: Tool to get details of the current user's Support PIN. Use when you need to retrieve the active support PIN and its expiration for the authenticated user.

inputSchema.title: GetUserSupportPinRequest
inputSchema.description: No parameters are required for this request.

tools.name: GITLAB_IMPORT_PROJECT_MEMBERS
tools.description: Tool to import members from one project to another. Use when migrating members between projects.

inputSchema.title: ImportProjectMembersRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the target project to receive members.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the source project to import members from.

inputSchema.description: Request model for importing project members from a source project to a target project.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_ALL_GROUP_MEMBERS
tools.description: Tool to list all members of a group including direct, inherited, and invited members. Use when you need a comprehensive membership list beyond direct members.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items per page for pagination.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_ALL_PROJECT_MEMBERS
tools.description: Tool to list all members of a project (direct, inherited, invited). Use when you need the effective membership list including inherited and invited members.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

query.title: Query
query.description: Filters results based on a given name, email, or username. Use partial values to widen the scope of the query.

state.title: State
state.description: Filter results by member state, one of 'awaiting' or 'active'. Premium and Ultimate only.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items per page for pagination.

user_ids.title: User Ids
user_ids.description: Filter the results on the given user IDs.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_BILLABLE_GROUP_MEMBERS
tools.description: Tool to list billable members of a top-level group (including its subgroups and projects). Use when generating billing reports; requires Owner role on the group.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the top-level group. Only top-level groups are supported.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort order for results. Supported values: access_level_asc|access_level_desc|last_joined|name_asc|name_desc|oldest_joined|oldest_sign_in|recent_sign_in|last_activity_on_asc|last_activity_on_desc.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search string to filter members by name, username, or public email.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items per page for pagination (must be ≥ 1).

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_GROUP_MEMBERS
tools.description: Tool to list direct members of a group. Use when you need to retrieve or filter a group's direct membership.

inputSchema.title: ListGroupMembersRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Order results by access level, ascending or descending.

query.title: Query
query.description: Filter members by name, username, or email substring.

active.title: Active
active.description: When true, return only active users.

relations.title: Relations
relations.description: Membership relation types to include: direct, descendants, inherited, or shared.

skip_users.title: Skip Users
skip_users.description: List of user IDs to exclude from the results.

two_factor.title: Two Factor
two_factor.description: Filter users by two-factor authentication status.

include_inherited.title: Include Inherited
include_inherited.description: Include members inherited from ancestor groups when true.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to list direct members of a GitLab group.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PENDING_GROUP_MEMBERS
tools.description: Tool to list pending members of a group and its subgroups and projects. Use when you need to review users awaiting approval or invited without an account. Call after confirming the top-level group ID.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the top-level group.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items per page for pagination (max 100).

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PIPELINE_JOBS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of jobs for a specified pipeline within a project. Use this when you need to inspect the status or details of jobs associated with a particular CI/CD pipeline.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: The scope of jobs to show. Can be a single status or a list of statuses. If not provided, all jobs are returned.

include_retried.title: Include Retried
include_retried.description: Include retried jobs in the response. Defaults to false.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PROJECT_GROUPS
tools.description: Tool to list ancestor groups of a project. Use when you need to retrieve all groups a project belongs to or is shared with.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number of the results to retrieve.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search for specific groups by name.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items to return per page.

with_shared.title: With Shared
with_shared.description: Include projects shared with this group. Default is false.

shared_visible_only.title: Shared Visible Only
shared_visible_only.description: Limit to shared groups user has access to.

shared_min_access_level.title: Shared Min Access Level
shared_min_access_level.description: Limit to shared groups with at least this access level.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PROJECT_INVITED_GROUPS
tools.description: Tool to list groups invited to a project. Use when auditing which groups have access to a project.

inputSchema.title: ListProjectInvitedGroupsRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items to return per page.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to list groups invited to a project.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PROJECT_PIPELINES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of pipelines for a specified project. Use when you need to get information about CI/CD pipelines, such as their status, source, or creation/update times.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

name.title: Name
name.description: Return pipelines with the specified name.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: The scope of pipelines, one of: 'running', 'pending', 'finished', 'branches', 'tags'.

source.title: Source
source.description: The pipeline source. To return child pipelines, set to 'parent_pipeline'.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items per page for pagination.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username of the user who triggered pipelines.

created_after.title: Created After
created_after.description: Return pipelines created after the specified date (ISO 8601 format).

updated_after.title: Updated After
updated_after.description: Return pipelines updated after the specified date (ISO 8601 format).

created_before.title: Created Before
created_before.description: Return pipelines created before the specified date (ISO 8601 format).

updated_before.title: Updated Before
updated_before.description: Return pipelines updated before the specified date (ISO 8601 format).

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PROJECT_SHAREABLE_GROUPS
tools.description: Tool to list groups that can be shared with a project. Use before sharing a project to fetch eligible groups.

inputSchema.title: ListProjectShareableGroupsRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search term to filter groups by name or path.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items per page for pagination.

skip_groups.title: Skip Groups
skip_groups.description: List of group IDs to exclude from the results.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to list groups that can be shared with a project.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PROJECT_TAGS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of repository tags for a specified project. Use when you need to get all tags associated with a project in GitLab.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number of the results to retrieve.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Return tags sorted in `asc` or `desc` order. Default is `desc`.

search.title: Search
search.description: Return a list of tags matching the search criteria. You can use `^term` and `term$` to find tags that begin and end with `term`.

order_by.title: Order By
order_by.description: Return tags ordered by `name`, `updated`, or `version`. Default is `updated`.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of items to return per page.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PROJECT_TRANSFER_LOCATIONS
tools.description: Tool to list namespaces available for project transfer. Use when you need to determine which groups a project can be transferred into.

inputSchema.title: ListProjectTransferLocationsRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

search.title: Search
search.description: The group names to search for.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing namespaces available for transferring a project.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_PROJECT_USERS
tools.description: Tool to list users of a project. Use after you have a project ID and want to retrieve its users.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

search.title: Search
search.description: Filter users by name or username.

skip_users.title: Skip Users
skip_users.description: List of user IDs to exclude from the result.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_REPOSITORY_COMMITS
tools.description: Tool to get a list of repository commits in a project. Use when you need to retrieve commit history for a specific project, branch, or time range.

all.title: All
all.description: Retrieve every commit from the repository. When set to true, the ref_name parameter is ignored.

path.title: Path
path.description: The file path to filter commits by.

order.title: Order
order.description: List commits in order. Possible values: default, topo. Defaults to default, the commits are shown in reverse chronological order.

since.title: Since
since.description: Only commits after or on this date are returned in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

until.title: Until
until.description: Only commits before or on this date are returned in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

ref_name.title: Ref Name
ref_name.description: The name of a repository branch, tag or revision range, or if not given the default branch.

trailers.title: Trailers
trailers.description: Parse and include Git trailers for every commit.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

with_stats.title: With Stats
with_stats.description: Stats about each commit are added to the response.

first_parent.title: First Parent
first_parent.description: Follow only the first parent commit upon seeing a merge commit.

tools.name: GITLAB_LIST_USER_PROJECTS
tools.description: Tool to list projects owned by a specific user. Use after obtaining target user identity to fetch owned projects.

inputSchema.title: ListUserProjectsRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or username of the user whose projects to list.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Return projects sorted in asc or desc order. Default is 'desc'.

owned.title: Owned
owned.description: Limit by projects explicitly owned by the specified user.

search.title: Search
search.description: Return list of projects matching search criteria (case-insensitive substring).

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: Return only limited fields for each project.

starred.title: Starred
starred.description: Limit by projects starred by the specified user.

id_after.title: Id After
id_after.description: Limit results to projects with IDs greater than the specified ID.

order_by.title: Order By
order_by.description: Return projects ordered by this field. Default is 'created_at'.

id_before.title: Id Before
id_before.description: Limit results to projects with IDs less than the specified ID.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Limit by projects that the current user is a member of.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Include project statistics. Available to Reporter role and above.

updated_after.title: Updated After
updated_after.description: Limit projects updated after given time (ISO 8601).

updated_before.title: Updated Before
updated_before.description: Limit projects updated before given time (ISO 8601).

min_access_level.title: Min Access Level
min_access_level.description: Limit by current user minimal role (access_level).

with_custom_attributes.title: With Custom Attributes
with_custom_attributes.description: Include custom attributes in response (admin only).

with_programming_language.title: With Programming Language
with_programming_language.description: Limit by projects which use the given programming language.

with_merge_requests_enabled.title: With Merge Requests Enabled
with_merge_requests_enabled.description: Limit by enabled merge requests feature.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing projects owned by a specific user.

tools.name: GITLAB_POST_USER_SUPPORT_PIN
tools.description: Tool to create a support PIN for your authenticated user. Use when GitLab Support requests a PIN to verify your identity.

inputSchema.title: PostUserSupportPinRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a support PIN. No parameters are required.

tools.name: GITLAB_PUT_USER_PREFERENCES
tools.description: Tool to update the current user's preferences. Use when adjusting default diff viewing and CI identity settings.

inputSchema.title: PutUserPreferencesRequest

view_diffs_file_by_file.title: View Diffs File By File
view_diffs_file_by_file.description: Flag indicating the user sees only one file diff per page.

show_whitespace_in_diffs.title: Show Whitespace In Diffs
show_whitespace_in_diffs.description: Flag indicating the user sees whitespace changes in diffs.

pass_user_identities_to_ci_jwt.title: Pass User Identities To Ci Jwt
pass_user_identities_to_ci_jwt.description: Flag indicating the user passes their external identities as CI information. Internal use only; do not expose to third-party services.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to update the current user's preferences.

tools.name: GITLAB_SET_USER_STATUS
tools.description: Tool to set the current user's status. Use when you need to update availability or convey current mood on GitLab.

inputSchema.title: SetUserStatusRequest

emoji.title: Emoji
emoji.description: Name of the emoji to use as status. Defaults to 'speech_balloon' if omitted.

message.title: Message
message.description: Status message to display. Max 100 characters; can contain emoji codes.

clear_status_after.title: Clear Status After
clear_status_after.description: Automatically clear status after the specified time interval. Allowed values: 30_minutes, 3_hours, 8_hours, 1_day, 3_days, 7_days, 30_days.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for setting the current user's status.

tools.name: GITLAB_SHARE_PROJECT_WITH_GROUP
tools.description: Tool to share a project with a group. Use when you need to grant a group specific access level to a project.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: The ID of the group to share with.

expires_at.title: Expires At
expires_at.description: Expiration date for the group share in YYYY-MM-DD format (ISO 8601).

group_access.title: Group Access
group_access.description: The access level to grant the group. One of GitLab's access levels, e.g., 30 for Developer, 40 for Maintainer.

tools.name: GITLAB_START_PROJECT_HOUSEKEEPING
tools.description: Tool to start the housekeeping task for a project. Use when you need to trigger manual maintenance or pruning on a repository.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

task.title: Task
task.description: Type of housekeeping task to perform. `prune` triggers a manual prune of unreachable objects; `eager` triggers eager housekeeping.
